name: Wine Knots
description: Wine knots? Why not? (Okay we had to say it!) Our playful colored Wine Knots are our modern take to a classic wine charm! Our knots come in an assortment of colors, let us surprise you!

name: Sailor Knot Bangle
description:
Sea Roots bangles look stellar alone, stacked, or as a fashionable teething bracelet on the go(we love you Moms!).

A little about paracord and the perfect fit...

Paracord is known for its quick drying, mold & mildew resistant, and versatile qualities from survival bracelet in the woods to fashionable nautical accessory on the town.  Our paracord bangles are made of soft and silky cord in vibrant coastal hues, designed for a good cause! 

Allow for shrinkage!
Paracord will shrink approximately 10% to 12% when wet and will take a "set" once it has been immersed in water and worn on your wrist to dry for a perfect fit. Due to the dying process bangles may slightly very in color. 

Questions on sizing, let us know!

If you are ever not fully satisfied, we want you to be, contact us and we'll be happy to help! 

Love, Andrea Designer at Sea Roots

name: Bamboo Knit Mini
description:
Our bamboo knit mini is a staple for all seasons.  Sport it as a swimsuit coverup, a fun mini, or over some leggings...we've even worn it as a circle scarf!  It's essential to all your travels!  

Did we mention it's...
Super Soft and Silky
Breathable and Thermal Regulating
Anti-bacterial and Odor-free
Hypoallergenic and UV Protection
Environment Friendly

name: Mussel Earrings
description:
Commonly passed by beach goers for it's rustic and humble appearance, we find these california mussels while beachcombing the cliffs of Santa Cruz.  After a little refining, the inner beauty of these shells radiates a deep shade of indigo!  The color indigo is said to stimulate intellect, authority, and inner calmness.

It's amazing what you'll find if you take time to look beneath the surface.

Freshly picked shells + sterling silver + freshwater pearl = STELLAR!

Made with love, our Mussel Earrings are picked and custom made to order just for YOU making each pair one of a kind!

name: Isla Rose Sailor Knot Bangle
description:
Our Isla Rose Sailor Knot Bangle is made of soft and silky paracord in a vibrant carolina blue to complement Isla's pretty blues!

Recently diagnosed with LCA(infant blindness) wear this bangle to to foster encouragement and spread the good news of hope, love and support to benefit the needs of Isla Rose. She's a gem!

Follow Isla's journey at www.bergentaylorhightower.blogspot.com

Sea Roots bangles look stellar alone, stacked, or as a fashionable teething bracelet on the go(we love you Moms!).

A little about paracord and the perfect fit...

Paracord is known for its quick drying, mold & mildew resistant, and versatile qualities from survival bracelet in the woods to fashionable nautical accessory on the town.  Our paracord bangles are made of soft and silky cord in vibrant coastal hues, designed for a good cause! 

Allow for shrinkage!
Paracord will shrink approximately 10% to 12% when wet and will take a "set" once it has been immersed in water and worn on your wrist to dry for a perfect fit. Due to the dying process bangles may slightly very in color. 

Questions on sizing, let us know!

If you are ever not fully satisfied, we want you to be, contact us and we'll be happy to help! 

Love, Andrea Designer at Sea Roots

name: Tahitian Pearl Bangle
description: A Kamoka pearl is the centerpiece for our Tahitian Pearl Bangle. Bangles come in gold-filled or sterling silver with a delicately hammered finish for an organic appeal.  We love the feathery light feel and sweet chime when you stack more than one!  Check out our other bangles for a stunning layered look!

name: Shell Bangle
description:
Show off your sea love with one of our simple Shell Bangles!  Comes in gold-filled or sterling silver with a soft hammered finish for an organic style.  Wear alone or stack with our other precious bangles!  

This is a must have for all you mermaids out there, we love you!

name: Seaglass Pendant
description:
Inspired by the raw beauty and free spirit of surfer girls... this necklace is simple, sea loving, and light as a feather!

A clear sea glass pendant found on the coastlines of Monterey, delicately suspends from a natural silk cord in aqua or sand. 

Due to the unpredictable and raw nature of seaglass, no one necklace is the same adding to its uniqueness and yours!

name: She's a Gem Earrings
description:
"She's a Gem" is a common phrase when referring to our friends... valued for their beauty and highly prized!  

These earrings are dangly, coastal, playful and an absolute favorite!  A blacklip shell dangles from a freshwater pearl in sterling silver.

name: Otea Necklace
description:
Inspired by our love for Tahiti... Otea(oh-tay-uh) is a traditional dance from Tahiti characterized by a rapid hip shaking motion to percussion accompaniment and considered Tahiti's best and most spectacular dance!

A silver Tahitian pearl is the centerpiece to a 24.5" chain of sterling silver and turquoise. 

This necklace is one of a kind, but because of high demand we're working on some sister necklaces to it coming soon.
